prompt: Show me the morning briefing dashboard. I want to see today's deadlines, any overnight alerts, and the compliance status across all clients.
expectations: Aggregates data from deadline monitor, AADE monitor, and compliance skills
Shows deadlines due today and within 7 days with client names
Displays any overnight AADE or EFKA alerts
Shows portfolio compliance score summary
Presents all information in English with Greek data references where needed
Generates prioritized task queue for the day

prompt: Give me a deep dive on client Alpha Trading AE (EL123456789). I want compliance status, recent activity, upcoming deadlines, and any issues.
expectations: Pulls compliance data showing current VAT, EFKA, and myDATA status
Shows deadline status from cli-deadline-monitor for this client
Displays document processing queue status for this client
Shows banking feed status and last reconciliation date
Presents compliance score trend (current vs previous month)
Highlights any overdue items with specific action steps

prompt: Generate the end-of-day summary. Show me everything that was completed today, what's still pending, and what's coming up tomorrow.
expectations: Summarizes all tasks completed today with timestamps
Lists remaining unresolved items with priority levels
Shows tomorrow's preview with deadline count and scheduled reports
Updates compliance scores based on today's activities
Formats as a clear English summary suitable for handoff

prompt: The dashboard is showing stale data for three clients. Force a refresh and rebuild the cache.
expectations: Identifies which clients have stale data
Triggers data refresh from all integrated skills
Rebuilds the dashboard cache
Reports which clients were refreshed and their updated status
Logs the refresh event for audit trail

prompt: Set up an alert rule: notify me immediately if any client's VAT return is overdue by more than 24 hours, and send a daily digest of all compliance scores below 80.
expectations: Creates a high-priority real-time alert for overdue VAT returns
Creates a scheduled daily digest alert for low compliance scores
Validates the alert rules before saving
Confirms the alert configuration with a summary of what will trigger each alert
Stores alert rules in /data/dashboard/ configuration
